amendment.description: To provide for a conveyance of land at the Naval Weapons Stations, Charleston, South Carolina.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3435 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3435 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S6714-6715; text: CR S6715) To provide for a conveyance of land at the Naval Weapons Stations, Charleston, South Carolina.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3435 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3435 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
